duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare budgetary documentation, audit responses, and evaluations of internal controls in support of programs.
Monitor and track acquisition schedules and program milestone schedules.
Initiate and track procurement and budget documentation.
Consolidate the accuracy of budget data estimates using statistical techniques.
Enter and manage documentation into the Government’s budgeting software systems.
Balancing budget and all funding requirements with Program Analysts.
Create execution documents including Military Interdepartmental Purchase Requests (MIPRs), Procurement Work Directives (PWDs), and funding reports.
Oversee Defense Travel System (DTS) and Automated Time Attendance and Production System (ATAAPS).

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting. ( Ten (10) years of budget experience can be considered in lieu of a degree.)
